import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' import './Timeline.css' import { getPostsApi } from '../../services/postServices' import {useQuery} from '@tanstack/react-query' import Navbar from './Navbar/Navbar' import PostCard from './PostCard/PostCard' import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap' const Timeline = ({user}) => { const {data:posts, isError, isLoading, isFetched, error} = useQuery({ queryFn: ()=> getPostsApi(), queryKey: ['list-posts'] }) return ( <>
{user && user.username ? user.username : 'guest'} Images Friends Posts
{isLoading &&

Loading posts....

} {isError &&

Error loading posts...

} {posts?.map((post) => ( {post.author.username} {post.title} {post.content} ))}

This is where my friends list is

) } export default Timeline
